column1: The below tables depict the main last departure airports and airlines analyzed by top markets
to Sri Lanka. Sri Lankan Airlines and IndiGo are the most popular airlines for Indians. Aeroflot
has become the most popular airline among tourists from Russia after resuming services to
Sri Lanka from the 9th October. Qatar Airways is the most preferable airline and Doha is the
main last departure airport for the majority of travellers from Germany and Switzerland,. The
figures further indicate that for tourists Sri Lankan Airlines is the most preferable airline from
the  United  Kingdom,  Australia,  Maldives,  Canada  ,  France  and  the  United  States.  This
indicates the importance of destination accessibility in driving visitation.
